name: Genesis Design Palette Pro – Google Web Fonts
author: Reaktiv Studios

sections.description:
Adds support for Google Web Fonts to Design Palette Pro. Provides the proper CSS and script loading to use the fonts. Requires the Genesis Design Palette Pro plugin.

New fonts in 2.0.0

  • All Google fonts are now supported through the Google fonts API.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the gppro-google-webfonts folder and all its contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Why Doesn’t This Work On My Theme?

This plugin only works with Design Palette Pro and a supported Genesis child theme.

How Many Fonts Are Included?

As of version 2.0, all 900+ Google Fonts are included when used in conjunction with Design Palette Pro 1.7+.
sections.changelog:
2.0.1

  • Add caching for Google Fonts API calls.
  • Add error logging for Google Fonts API calls.
  • Fix: Adds a link to the font page on Google Fonts.
  • Fix: Sets the correct source on the legacy fonts as “google”.

2.0.0

  • Add support for Google Fonts API.
  • Include all Google Fonts in new Design Palette Pro fonts tool.

1.0.8

  • No more tofu!

1.0.7

  • Yo dawg, I heard you liked fonts so I put some fonts in your fonts

1.0.6

  • Fonts. It’s always about the fonts, isn’t it

1.0.5

  • Added some more fonts, because who doesn’t love more fonts?

1.0.4

  • Added new handwriting / cursive and monospace style fonts

1.0.3

  • Added new fonts

1.0.2

  • Updated core plugin verification

1.0.1

  • Added new fonts

1.0.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Adds support for Google Web Fonts to Design Palette Pro
description:
Adds support for Google Web Fonts to Design Palette Pro. Provides the proper CSS and script loading to use the fonts. Requires the Genesis Design Palette Pro plugin.

New fonts in 2.0.0

  • All Google fonts are now supported through the Google fonts API.

upgrade_notice.2.0.0: You must be running version 1.7.0 of Design Palette Pro or newer to use the new Google Fonts API feature.
upgrade_notice.1.0.4: You must be running version 1.2.3 of Design Palette Pro or newer to use these new fonts
